options.name: -a
tip:
U: -a|--algorithm <ALGORITHM>
select the digest type to use. See DIGEST below
[possible values: sysv, bsd, crc, md5, sha1, sha224, sha256, sha384, sha512, blake2b, sm3]

options.name: --untagged
options.tip: create a reversed style checksum, without digest type

options.name: --tag
options.tip: create a BSD style checksum, undo --untagged (default)

options.name: -l
--raw
options.tip: emit a raw binary digest, not hexadecimal

options.name: -b
options.tip: emit a base64 digest, not hexadecimal

description: Print CRC and size for each file.
